title: Sunday Service
content: Join us this Sunday at 10am for our weekly service. Special guest speaker will be present.

title: Bible Study
content: Wednesday Bible study group meets at 7pm in the main hall. All are welcome.

title: Youth Group
content: Friday youth group meeting at 6pm. Pizza will be served!

title: Community Outreach
content: Volunteers needed for Saturday community outreach program from 9am-12pm.

title: Choir Practice
content: Choir members should attend Thursday practice at 5:30pm in preparation for Sunday.

title: Men's Breakfast
content: Men's fellowship breakfast at 8am at the church cafe.

title: Women's Bible Study
content: Thursday morning women's Bible study at 10am in room 102.

title: Prayer Meeting
content: Evening prayer meeting at 7pm in the chapel.

title: Children's Ministry
content: Sunday School teachers meeting at 11:30am after service.

title: Mission Trip Info Session
content: Learn about our summer mission trip opportunities at 1pm in the fellowship hall.

title: Easter Service
content: Special Easter Sunday service at 9am with communion.

title: Potluck Dinner
content: Wednesday night potluck dinner after Bible study. Bring a dish to share!
